title: Lincoln's WARNING #100023: Climate Policy Controversy
script: Climate Policy Controversy? Man, I'm DEAD and I got more life than these politicians! They out here playing dress-up in suits, pocket full of lobby money, telling YOU to tighten your belt while their stomachs touching their KNEES! Bitcoin below. Climate Policy Controversy? Bread and circuses for the modern age. Keep you scared, keep you spending. That's the formula. See through it. Bitcoin below.
